About Me About Me Hi, I’m Cao Fulei, a graphics software engineer primarily using C++. I entered the workforce in March 2020. Resume Work Experience C++ Developer (August 2021 - December 2023) Company: Beijing Zhongke Dayang Technology Development Co., Ltd. Low-Level Development: Wrapped OpenGL low-level modules and wrote GLSL shaders to enable rendering support for both OpenGL and DirectX, resulting in a 100%+ overall rendering performance improvement.
